#include<bits/stdc++.h>

using namespace std;
typedef long long ll;
ll dp[55][55];
ll rec(string s, int i, int j) {
    if(i>j)
        return 0;
    if(i==j)
        return 1;
    if(dp[i][j]!=-1)
        return dp[i][j];
    ll ans;
    ans=rec(s,i,j-1)+rec(s,i+1,j)-rec(s,i+1,j-1);
        dp[i][j]=ans;
    if(s[i]==s[j])
    ans += 1+rec(s,i+1,j-1);
        dp[i][j]=ans;
    return dp[i][j];
}
int main() {
    int t;cin>>t;
    while(t-- ) {
        memset(dp,-1,sizeof(dp));
        string s;
        cin>>s;
        cout<<rec(s,0,s.size()-1)<<endl;
    }
}
